creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons and Dr. Rosa Lynn Pinkus
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: white body, red cloth trim at neckline (with notch at one shoulder); pink, red and orange trim at sleeve openings; front and back woven with red and pink geometric diamond and zigzag designs and small and large quadrupeds
markings: below design on masking tape; in blue: [Sta apolonia]
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
